alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 11:13PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oneida and Madison Counties through Midnight EDT... At 1113 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nelson, or 11 miles southwest of Oneida, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Sullivan, Oneida, Kirkland, Lenox, Lee, Verona, Westmoreland, Vienna and Eaton. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
